sentence.Network_en: Chronic nonspecific ulcerative colitis is a disease with exacerbations and remissions.
sentence.Network_cn: 慢性非特异性溃疡性结肠炎这种病可以恶化亦可缓解.

sentence.Network_en: Ulcerative colitis and granulomatous colitis affect many children and young adults.
sentence.Network_cn: 溃疡性结肠炎和肉芽肿性结肠炎常侵害儿童和刚成年的年青人.

sentence.Network_en: The most lethal complication is fulminating colitis.
sentence.Network_cn: 最严重的致死性并发症是暴发性结肠炎.

entry.def: Colitis is an illness in which your colon becomes inflamed.

auth_sentence.content: C. difficile causes pseudomembranous colitis, with potentially fatal diarrhea.
